DataElement.preferredName: Speech Grammatical Impairment Rice Grammaticality Judgment Task Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The exchange of spoken words._A test that assesses a respondent's knowledge of grammar. It identifies respondents with specific language impairment (SLI) or other categories of language impairment._An examiner-administered, 20-item grammar judgment task. The respondent listens to a series of prerecorded sentences (items) and indicates whether the sentence is grammatically correct._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A test that assesses a respondent's knowledge of grammar. It identifies respondents with specific language impairment (SLI) or other categories of language impairment.
An examiner-administered, 20-item grammar judgment task. The respondent listens to a series of prerecorded sentences (items) and indicates whether the sentence is grammatically correct.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Changed from caBIG to PhenX for PANH by script 2015-12-21

ReferenceDocuments.name: The Rice Grammaticality Judgm
ReferenceDocuments.description: The Rice Grammaticality Judgment Task is an examiner-administered, 20-item grammar judgment task. The respondent listens to a series of prerecorded sentences (items) and indicates whether the sentence is grammatically correct.
